item.title: 2002 Gingseng Wars
item.description: The 2002 Gingseng Wars were a series of conflicts relating to the procurement of Gingseng, yes that gingseng. In 1994, second last Era, the [[notes/characters/High Commander|High Commander]] at the time declared that Gingseng was to be used as the main currency of Sariel.

item.title: Luna
item.description: Luna is Sariel’s lone moon that orbits around it. There isn’t anything too important about it, per se, but rumours suggest that [[notes/world/misc/Magic|magic]] is dictated by the phases of the moon.

item.title: Magic
item.description: W.I.P. - TOO MANY VARIABLES TO CONSIDER (THAT ARE MOSTLY UNDEVELOPED.)

item.title: Old Aristocracy
item.description: The Old Aristocracy (OA) refers to a period in time where the [[notes/characters/High Commander|High Commander]] was effectively a puppet to a group of old and wealthy individuals.

item.title: On the Topic of Languages...
item.description: Sariel is a vibrant world with an equally vibrant population - the vast majority of the world speaks Common. However, many non-humanoid races speak it as their second+ language.

item.title: Prima Lux
item.description: Prima Lux is considered to be the most important out of the three major companies - founded by Demba Scientifica, PL is the largest company by revenue in Sariel.

item.title: Race overview
item.description: To avoid making dozens of pages this is a list of the most popular races on Sariel (that we know exist).

item.title: Regions of Sariel
item.description: Sariel consists two main island masses in a specific area on the planet. Above: rough map of Sariel as we know it.

item.title: Santeaux
item.description: Santeaux might just be the most desolate place on Sariel - that has any beings on it. It’s a literal sh!

item.title: The Ship
item.description: Your Home away from Home The Ship (formally known as the *Discovery One*) is your home in this foreign land. Its distinct features and "

item.title: Xertanium
item.description: Xertanium is an ultra-rare mineral that has not been yet found in Sariel, with the exemption of the crown that the [[notes/characters/High Commander|High Commander]] wears.
